name: Matteo Migliavacca
content: Matteo Migliavacca - School of Computing - University of Kent Jump to content design1 Matteo Migliavacca Senior Lecturer Year in Computing Admissions Officer Email m.migliavacca@kent.ac.uk Telephone +44 (0)1634 20 2912 More information ORCID iD: 0000-0002-5684-4865 Location Room 118 Kennedy Building University of Kent Canterbury Kent CT2 7FS On this page About Research interests About Research interests Matteo belongs to the following research groups:Artificial Intelligence and Data Science GroupCyber Security GroupI work in networked systems, with en emphasis on system building and evaluation. My research interests include parallel data processing, including stream processing and publish subscribe middleware in large scale and cloud scenarios.Lately I have been involved in security, including secure event processing, runtime taint tracking and information flow control in a variety of languages from Java, to PHP and Erlang.I am currently collaborating with the LSDS group at Imperial College on Stateful Big Data processing (SEEP project) and Network as a Service (NaaS project) also in collaboration with Microsoft Research. Last updated 20 October 2023
